author: Perez Hilton
title: Women's March Phase II Is Going To Seriously Screw Up Sexists' Day — Get The Deets!
text:
2/06/2017 7:44   Controversy • Girl Power • Social Issues 
The work continues!! 
Following the highly-successful (no matter what Donald Trump says) Women's March on Washington last month, the organizers from the protest have announced their second official event – a women's STRIKE! 
That's right, Drumpf! 
Related: Kanye West Is DONE With Trump! 
The group announced the "general strike" that will be a "day without a woman" on social media on Monday saying: 
The will of the people will stand. A photo posted by Women's March (@womensmarch) on Feb 6, 2017 at 8:03am PST 
We wonder if they were inspired by all those sexists asking them why they weren't at work during the march (which was on Saturday, btw). 
Although no further information has been given (date, time, etc.) we are SO here for this!!! 
The people WILL NOT stand, y'all! 
Buzzfeed reports the organizers of the Women's March will be meeting on Tuesday with the organizers of the "National General Strike" which will take place on February 17 "in defense of our nation's constitution." 
We will keep you updated as soon as we learn more information! 
Will U go on strike in solidarity?? Let us know in the comments! Celebrities Who've Been Dropped By Major Brands & Retailers   Celebrities Who Love Prostitutes!   Craziest Conspiracy Theories Of 2016! View Pics »
